thread.title: Man in wheelchair killed by hit-run driver on Long Island
thread.title_full: Man in wheelchair killed by hit-run driver on Long Island - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: wcax.com
title: Man in wheelchair killed by hit-run driver on Long Island
text:
WEST BABYLON, N.Y. (AP) - Police are looking for a hit-and-run driver who fatally struck a man in a wheelchair on Long Island.
The accident happened at 9:15 p.m. Friday in West Babylon.
Suffolk County police say a dark-colored Nissan struck 40-year-old Michael Dora in his wheelchair.
Dora, of West Babylon, was taken to a hospital, where he was pronounced dead.
Police say the car that hit the victim may have sustained front-end damage.
